string.value: The time (in seconds) AI remains disoriented after losing weapon before attempting to pick it up. Default: 1.5 seconds
The range (in meters) AI searches for dropped weapons. Default: 5.0 meters
The interval (in seconds) between AI's pickup attempts. Default: 1.0 second
The interval (in seconds) for memory cleanup. Default: 30.0 seconds
The duration (in seconds) cached data is retained. Default: 60.0 seconds
Cache Settings - Optimizations for overall game performance, recommended to keep default
